effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the []{location:mining-museum} in []{location:oreburgh-city} or the Museum of Science in []{location:pewter-city} to receive a []{pokemon:lileep}.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into a Lileep.

flavor_text_entries.text:
大昔　海に　すんでいた
古代ポケモンの　カセキ。
ねっこの　一部らしい。

A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon
that once lived in the sea. It looks as
if it could be part of a plant’s root.

Fossile di un Pokémon preistorico che viveva in
mare. Sembra essere parte di una radice.

Fósil de un Pokémon ancestral que vivió en el
fondo del mar. Parece ser parte de una raíz.

Das Fossil eines uralten Pokémon, das in der
Tiefsee lebte. Es sieht wie eine Pflanzenwurzel
aus.

Le fossile d’un ancien Pokémon aquatique.
On dirait un morceau de racine.

오랜 옛날 바다에 살았던
고대 포켓몬의 화석.
뿌리의 일부인 듯하다.

おおむかし　うみに　すんでいた
こだい　ポケモンの　カセキ。
ねっこの　いちぶ　らしい。

A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a plant root.

A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a plant root.

Fossile d’un ancien Pokémon aquatique.
On dirait un morceau de racine de
plante.

A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a plant root.

A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a plant root.

A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea. It appears to be
part of a plant root.

A fossil of an ancient, seafloor-
dwelling POKéMON. It appears to be
part of a plant root.

ancient, seafloor-
